title: A Day to Say Thank You - 2
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>I’m so happy that there are still more events to hold~! Even after the first day, there’s still more to look forward to! ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Let’s keep everyone entertained today too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin is super hyped!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Me too! I can’t wait to meet everyone again.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I hope I can convey my gratitude to all of them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>You guys look great! It’s going to be another great event today! Lanzhu, the expert on Nijigaku’s school idols, can assure this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Lanzhu, you’re one of us too. Let’s make this a wonderful event together. You too, Mia!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Don’t just throw me out there all of a sudden. This kind of atmosphere doesn’t fit my image......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Come on~ Ai knows that Miachi has been preparing super diligently for this event. In fact, everyone knows that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>That’s right. It doesn’t matter what you say your image is. We all understand how you actually feel. ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Huh!? Wha-What do you mean!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Let’s just enjoy our day together and have as much fun as we can.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Alright, everyone! Is everyone ready?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yes, ma’am! Let’s make today the cutest day ever!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
